common.title: Alcohol-Free Week | 7-Day Challenge
common.description: Start a healthy lifestyle with a 7-day alcohol-free challenge. Alcohol-Free Week is an app that supports your journey to sobriety.

hero.title: Meet a new you in 7 days
hero.description: Alcohol-Free Week is an app that helps you develop healthy habits through a 7-day alcohol-free challenge.

intro.title: 7-Day Alcohol-Free Challenge
intro.description: Want to quit drinking but can't do it alone? Alcohol-Free Week supports you with a 7-day challenge. Build healthy habits together with others who share the same goal.

feature1.title: 7-Day Challenge
feature1.description: Build the habit of staying alcohol-free in just 7 days. The short duration makes it easy to start and maintain, giving you a sense of achievement.

feature2.title: Track and Visualize Progress
feature2.description: Record your daily progress and visualize it with charts. Building on small successes helps maintain your motivation.

feature3.title: Community Support
feature3.description: Encourage each other and exchange advice with others who share the same goal. What you can't do alone becomes possible with a community.

testimonial1.name: 30s Male
testimonial1.title: My habits changed in 7 days
testimonial1.message: I thought 7 days would be impossible at first, but with the app's support and community encouragement, I successfully completed the 7 days. Now I only drink on weekends.

testimonial2.name: 40s Female
testimonial2.title: First step to a healthy lifestyle
testimonial2.message: Alcohol-Free Week made me more conscious of healthy habits. The short 7-day period made it easy to start.

testimonial3.name: 20s Male
testimonial3.title: I can keep going with friends
testimonial3.message: I definitely couldn't have done it alone. The encouragement from the community and progress visualization greatly helped maintain my motivation.

final-cta.title: Start your 7-day challenge
final-cta.description: Take the first step toward a healthy lifestyle with Alcohol-Free Week.

store-badges.title: App Store
store-badges.description: Rated 4.5+ stars on the App Store.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Get in touch with the Alcohol-Free Week team here.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: Read Alcohol-Free Week's terms of service.
